mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.fuzhuang_name as fuzhuangName ,a.fuzhuang_photo as fuzhuangPhoto ,a.fuzhuang_types as fuzhuangTypes ,a.fuzhuang_kucun_number as fuzhuangKucunNumber ,a.fuzhuang_price as fuzhuangPrice ,a.fuzhuang_old_money as fuzhuangOldMoney ,a.fuzhuang_new_money as fuzhuangNewMoney ,a.fuzhuang_clicknum as fuzhuangClicknum ,a.fuzhuang_content as fuzhuangContent ,a.shangxia_types as shangxiaTypes ,a.fuzhuang_delete as fuzhuangDelete ,a.create_time as createTime
